They are sewn with solid stitches, making them less likely to fall off or tear. Therefore, you don't have to worry about lotion seeping through the self tanner glove , allowing you to say goodbye to orange palms. The thumb design makes it easier for you to evenly apply tanning lotion to your body, giving you a perfect tanning experience.

【Double-sided and Durable】 Our tanning gloves for self tan lotion and self tanner back applicator are both double-sided, which makes our self tanner mit and back tanning applicator have a longer lifespan than single-sided tanning lotion mitt, and even more than 2 times longer, with higher cost-effectiveness. Our self tanning mitt applicator features a special non-absorbent internal structure, so it absorbs very little, and won't waste your lotion.

【The Perfect Self Tan Brush with Outstanding Results】 Our kabuki brush for self tanner brush is made of ultrafine, soft, and high-density synthetic bristles, which are less likely to fall out and won't cause any stinging sensation when in contact with the body. The body brush self tanner brush wavy brush head design increases the contact area with the body, enhances the blending effect, and makes the application surface smoother, without leaving streaks or bubbles, for even skin tanning.

【Multi-Purpose and Reusable】 This self tan mit is suitable for any tanning lotion, cream, moisturizer, mousse, oil, etc. sunless tanner mitt can be washed with clothes in the washing machine after use, and then hung to dry. You can also wash it by hand with warm water, which can extend its lifespan. The self tanner mitt applicator will not lose its softness due to washing, and can be cleaned and reused after being washed thoroughly.

Product Includes： 1 * self tan glove 1 * self tanning brush for body 1 * self tanner back applicator Washing Instructions： Please wash the tanning gloves for self tan lotion and back tanning applicator separately from light-colored clothes.
